apihelp-wikidexpage-description: Retrieves all the information of a page to be displayed on the app.
apihelp-wikidexpage-summary: Retrieves all the information of a page to be displayed on the app.
apihelp-wikidexpage-param-title: Title of the page to query.
apihelp-wikidexpage-example-page: Gets the informaton for the page 'Guía de Detective Pikachu/Página 1'.
apihelp-wikidexeditpreview-description: Previews an edit for the app.
apihelp-wikidexeditpreview-summary: Previews an edit for the app.
apihelp-wikidexeditpreview-param-title: Title of the page to edit.
apihelp-wikidexeditpreview-param-text: Contents of the page to edit.
apihelp-wikidexeditpreview-param-section: Wheter it's a section preview or an edit of the whole page.
apihelp-wikidexeditpreview-example-page: Peviews an edit on the page 'Guía de Detective Pikachu/Página 1'.
apihelp-wikidexappassetbundle-descriptio: Retrieves assets like CSS and scripts for the app.
apihelp-wikidexappassetbundle-summary: Retrieves assets like CSS and scripts for the app.
apihelp-wikidexappassetbundle-example-si: Gets the assets for the app.
